subject: Unable to access my account after password reset
body:
Hi,

I've been trying to log into my account for the past 2 hours after resetting my password. Each time I try, I get an error saying 'Invalid credentials'. I've tried resetting my password 3 times now and nothing works.

This is really frustrating because I have a client presentation tomorrow and all my files are in the platform. I need this resolved ASAP.

My account email is john.smith@acmecorp.com

Thanks,
John Smith
Senior Project Manager, Acme Corp
